yes are truely brillant.i love every album they,v made ,except one,this one! .Jon Anderson wasn,t on this one and it needs to be forgotten,its realy bad,no direction at all.
try .close to the edge or tormato ,big generator and 90125 . they are alot better if you what to give YES a try
